verses.text: ‘E HOKU ‘Otua, ‘e hoku ‘Otua, ko e hā kuo ke li‘aki ai au? ‘O fakamama‘o mei hoku tokoni; mei he le‘o ‘o ‘eku kavekalanga atu?
‘E hoku ‘Otua, ‘oku ou tangi ‘aho, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘o tali; Pea u fai po‘uli, ‘o ‘ikai te u tuku ha taimi.
Ka ‘oku ke mā‘oni‘oni, ‘A e ‘Afiona ‘oku ke nofo‘ia ‘a e ngaahi fakamālō ‘a ‘Isileli,
Na‘e falala ‘emau ngaahi tamai kiate koe: Na‘a nau falala, pea na‘a ke fakamo‘ui pē.
Ko koe na‘e fai ki ai ‘enau kalanga, pea nau ‘atā: Ko koe na‘e fai ki ai ‘enau falala, pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau mā.
Ka ko au ko e kelemutu ‘o ‘ikai ko e tangata; Ko e manuki‘anga ‘o e kakai, pea ta‘etoka‘i ‘e he fonua.
‘Ilonga ha taha ‘oku sio mai ‘oku ne luma kiate au: ‘Oku nau fakatōtao honau ngutu, ‘oku nau kalokalo ‘a e ‘ulu.
“Tekaki kia Sihova – Ke ne fakahaofi ia; Ke ne hamusi ia, he ko hono mamana.”
Kae fēfē, he ko koe na‘a ke to‘o au mei he manava; ‘I he‘eku ‘i he huhu ‘o ‘eku fa‘ē na‘a ke ngaohi au ke u falala.
Na‘e lī atu au mei he manava ko ho‘o kavenga pē: Ko hoku ‘Otua ai pē koe mei he fatu ‘o ‘eku fa‘ē.
‘Oua te ke mama‘o meiate au, he ko e faingata‘a ‘oku ofi; Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha tokoni.
Na‘e kāpui au ‘e he fanga pulu tokolahi; Na‘e ha‘o au ‘e he ha‘a kaukaua ‘o Pēsani.
‘Oku nau fakamanga honau ngutu kiate au, Ko e laione tofu pē ‘oku kokohi mo kālou.
Kuo u malingi hangē ha vai, Pea ‘oku ngatōtō hoku ngaahi hui: Kuo hangē ha uakisi hoku loto ia, Kuo vaia ‘i hoku loto to‘oto‘onga.
Kuo maha hoku ivi ‘o hangē ko ha konga ipu kelekele; Pea ‘oku piki hoku ‘elelo ki hoku kaungao ē; Pea te ke ‘ai au ki he efu ‘o e mate.
He ‘oku kāpui au ‘e he fanga kulī: Kuo ha‘o au ‘e he fakataha ‘o e kau faikovi; Ko hoku nima mo hoku va‘e na‘a nau vili.
‘Oku ou malau hoku ngaahi hui kotoa; ‘Oku sio fakamama‘u ‘e kinautolu na, ‘Oku nau siofia kita.
‘Oku nau tufa fakaekinautolu hoku ‘ū kofu, Pea ko hoku sote ‘oku nau talotalo ki hano ma‘u.
Kae‘oua te ke mama‘o koe, ‘Eiki: ‘E hoku Mālohinga, vave mai ke tokoni.
Hāmusi mei he heletā ‘eku mo‘ui; Si‘eku me‘a pē taha mei he fa‘iteliha ‘a e kulī.
Fakahaofi au mei he ngutu ‘o e laione, Pea mei he nifo ‘o e fanga pufaloe– Tā kuo ke tali pē!
Ko ia ai, te u ‘a‘au ho hingoa ki hoku kāinga: Te u fakamālō kiate koe ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e fakataha.
“A e kau ‘apasia kia Sihova, mou fakamālō kiate ia: ‘A e hako fuli pē ‘o Sēkope, mou fakahīkihiki‘i ia; ‘Io, pea mou ‘apasia kiate ia, ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli kotoa.
He na‘e ‘ikai te ne ta‘etoka‘i, pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne fakalili‘a He mamahi ‘a si‘i fakamālohi; Pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne hanga kehe meiate ia; Pea ‘i he‘ene tangi ange na‘a ne talia.”
Ko ‘eku fakamālō ‘i he fakataha lahi ‘oku mei he ‘Afiona: Te u fai ‘eku tukumo‘ui ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai ‘oku lotu kiate ia.
‘E kai ‘e si‘i ta‘ali‘ekina, ‘o mākona: ‘E fakamālō kia Sihova ‘e ha‘a kumi kiate ia. Ke mo‘ui homou loto ‘o ta‘engata!
‘E manatu mo tafoki ki he ‘Eiki ‘a e ngaahi ngata‘anga ‘o māmani: Pea ‘e hū ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Afiona ‘a e matakali fuli pē ‘o e tukui pule‘anga.
He ko e pule ‘oku ‘ia Sihova; Pea ‘oku ne tāfataha ‘i he ngaahi pule‘anga.
‘E kai mo lotu ‘a e fa‘ahinga sino ‘o māmani: Ko kinautolu kuo mei ‘alu hifo ki he efu te nau tū‘ulutui ki ai, Mo ia ‘oku ‘ikai lava ke ta‘ofi hono laumālie ke mo‘ui.
‘E ai ha hako te nau tauhi ki ai; Pea ‘e fakahā ki he to‘utangata ko ē ‘a e me‘a ‘oku kau kia ‘Ātonai.
Te nau ha‘u ‘o fakahā ‘ene mā‘oni‘oni; Te nau tala ki ha kakai ka toki fanau‘i, “Kuo ne fai.”
